body: As Jamaica considers making Bob Marley a national hero, Repeating Islands comments: "And I had always (wrongly) assumed that Bob Marley was already a national hero. I do hope that he will soon receive this honor."
original_body: As Jamaica considers making Bob Marley a national hero, Repeating Islands comments: "And I had always (wrongly) assumed that Bob Marley was already a national hero. I do hope that he will soon receive this honor."
title: Jamaica: Bob, Our Hero
